subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0165_01CA4D7C.22F2A050
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

[One thing I think we can all agree on:  one knows it all. Not me, not you,=
 and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civilization.]

I do.


Just te=
asin' ;)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 15, 2009 8:46 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: 2012 is not the end!


    F-S, I certainly hope I didn't offend you=
 with anything I said.  I certainly do not claim to be a braniac or a know-=
it-all, as you have called me in your post.

        In fact I am saying th=
e opposite: I am saying that I do not know:  I am saying I do not know how =
anyone can believe these 2012 predictions when all they have is stories and=
 questionable claims.  I don't know how they can believe this stuff when th=
ey actually DO have evidence that all the similar claims in the past have b=
een shown to be false. I do not know why they believe this claim is any mor=
e justified than all the others,

        I do not know how the group can s=
ay on its home page " It's one thing to be skeptical, it's another to ignor=
e and deny all evidence.", yet it is the people who are certain of the 2012=
 prophecies that seem to be ignoring and denying evidence that it is only o=
ne more in a long line of unsupported failed predictions, not those who are=
 skeptical of it.

        I do not know how it justifies you referring to =
me as  a "wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all", when the group home pag=
e suggests such attacks get people banned.  I do not know how being skeptic=
al of a future prophecy makes one a know it all. And I do not know how prom=
pting people to judge for themselves makes me a know it all. 

        And =
I don't know why the group home page says a good argument is ok, yet you st=
art name-calling offended when someone questions something you do not agree=
 with, or proposes a theory alternate to your own.

        So call me igno=
rant.  Obviously I really don't know very much at all.  

        But of th=
e very few things I do know, I now it is good to question, and not take eve=
rything, especially prophecies, at face value.  And I know the best way to =
test a prophecy, and the people making them, is to see if they actually com=
e to pass.  And I know that since no evidence can support a prophecy's trut=
h until it comes to pass, and since all past end-of-world prophecies have n=
o evidence of their success, that those who think they know something speci=
al about why 2012 is different, certainly know more than I.

        And so=
 I hope they (or you, if you count yourself among them) will post your evid=
ence, and your predictions, and your dates.  And we won't have to argue abo=
ut it.  We can just put that person, and their predictions, and their dates=
, on our calendars, and judge when the date comes, who was really acting as=
 a know-it-all.  

        One thing I think we can all agree on:  one know=
s it all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican civil=
ization.

        Rj





        --- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <=
purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


          From: purplespacefriend <purp=
lealiengirl@...>
          Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end=
!
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, October =
14, 2009, 6:56 PM


            
          I stopped getting the group e-ma=
il months ago, I should also stop reading the posts as well. All these grou=
ps are full of wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all, and laugh at anyone=
 that gets voices outside of the little micro paranormal world. And that is=
 not aimed at April!--RJ

          F-S

          --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:
          >
          > Wow=
..some how, I missed getting a bunch of messages it appears.
          > 
 =
         > To Frank - don't shoot the messenger. Just sayin'
          > 
 =
         > ----- Original Message ----- 
          > From: Rj 
          > =
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
          > Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2009=
 4:13 PM
          > Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
      =
    > 
          > 
          > Other than various claims, there is no evid=
ence that anything will happen in 2012: it will be the same as every other =
end-of-world prediction made before.
          > 
          > Then someone =
will "recalculate" , or proclaim a new EVP message, and point at 2013! Or 2=
014! 
          > 
          > However, I really do like it when people pic=
k specific dates for predictions. Besides being entertaining, it gives ever=
yone a chance to judge for themselves just how much the predictor is like a=
ll the others who have marched around carrying those "THE END OF THE WORLD =
IS NIGH" signs. Full of nothing but themselves and their delusions.
       =
   > 
          > --- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@=
 ...> wrote:
          > 
          > 
          > From: purplespacefriend =
<purplealiengirl@ ...>
          > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the e=
nd!
          > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
          > Date: Wednesday, O=
ctober 14, 2009, 2:59 PM
          > 
          > 
          > 
          >=
 And you can expect the debunking to escalate, but go ahead--everyone knows=
 the media always tells the truth. 
          > Trillions of $$$ are missin=
g, and some suspect it's been used to build secret bunkers for the elite to=
 ride out the shift in, and you think they are not going to spend a bit mor=
e on dis-information to keep panicked hords from over running their hidy ho=
les. 
          > 
          > These same sources you quote will also tell =
you there are no sprits, hence no EVP, yet you don't believe that. 
       =
   > 
          > Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every freaking cultur=
e in the world has the exact same predictions- the exact same date-just coi=
ncidence no doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in common with may=
an calendar creators as I have with the man in the moon to know anything at=
 all about it. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an opinion th=
at is gospel and unquestionable. You can find any information you want to h=
ear, whether it's EVP or 2012.
          > 
          > You better take a c=
loser look at your world, if nothing happens to change this crap hole, the =
future is extrememly bleak-- a slow rotting death that goes on for milenia.=
 
          > 
          > F-S
          >
